title: COD: Black Ops III
description: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III Xbox 360 version does not include a co-op or single-player campaign game mode, and does not contain all game features present in the Xbox One version. Game performance varies by platform. For more details visit callofduty.com/blackops3/features.  Call of Duty®: Black Ops III for Xbox 360 features two game modes only: Multiplayer and Zombies, providing fans with an expansive Multiplayer and an all-new film-noir inspired Zombies adventure.  Multiplayer provides new ways to rank up, customize, and gear up for battle. Zombies delivers a full-experience experience with its own distinct storyline.  © 2015 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, CALL OF DUTY BLACK OPS, and stylized roman numeral III are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - Awakening DLC
childDownloads.description: DLC 1 Awakening for Black Ops 3 with all new Zombies and MP content is available now!  The latest installment of Zombies picks up where The Giant left off, as the Origins characters head to Der Eisendrache on a mission to stop the zombie apocalypse.  Go guns up in Black Ops 3 Multiplayer, featuring  4 new maps: Skyjacked, Splash, Gauntlet, and Rise.  Skyjacked: A reimagined classic that retains the same fast and frenetic gameplay from one of the most popular maps in Call of Duty® history.  Gauntlet: Plays up the core philosophy of Treyarch’s classic three-lane map structure with three distinct environments.  Splash: Set in an abandoned water park, an imaginative environment with waterslides, a lazy river and a wrecked pirate ship.  Rise: A Coalescence Corporation construction project catering to a mix of classic Call of Duty cover based combat.

childDownloads.title: Black Ops III - The Giant Zombies Map
childDownloads.description: Zombies returns in all of its undead glory with "The Giant," a research facility featuring the weapon-upgrading Pack-a-Punch Machine.   Re-live the chaos of Treyarch’s classic "Der Riese" Zombies map, picking up the Zombies story with Dempsey, Nikolai, Richtofen, and Takeo where Origins left off.   © 2015 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, CALL OF DUTY BLACK OPS, and stylized roman numeral III are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc.
